column4: When I do iwconfig wlan0 in terminal i see that essid = off/any. Even if i do sudo iwconfig wlan0 essid MYESSID and then immediately iwconfig wlan0, the essid is set to off/any. Can anyone help me to fix this problem?
no this is a desktop pc, using a belkin f5d7000uk card (rtl8185l chipset) im using a windows driver with ndiswrapper
any idea what the problem is?
